sourcesContent:
import { Box, Flex, Heading, Select, Text, Input, TableContainer, Table, Thead, Tr, Th, Tbody, Td, Button, useDisclosure, Modal, ModalOverlay, ModalContent, ModalHeader, ModalCloseButton, ModalBody, FormControl, FormLabel, ModalFooter, Avatar, Textarea} from "@chakra-ui/react"; import SidebarSuperAdmin from "../../components/SidebarSuperAdmin"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import api from "../../services/api"; const CustomerManajemen = () => { const { isOpen, onOpen, onClose } = useDisclosure(); // Second Modal Delete Data const [secondModal, setSecondModal] = useState(false); const closeSecondModal = () => setSecondModal(false); const openSecondModal = () => setSecondModal(true); // Third Modal Add Data Customer const [thirdModal, setThirdModal] = useState(false); const closeThirdModal = () => setThirdModal(false); const openThirdModal = () => setThirdModal(true); // state to save response data all customer const [dataCust, setDataCust] = useState([]); // get all customer data const getAllCust = async () => { try { const response = await api.get('/api/v4/cust'); setDataCust(response.data.payload); } catch (error) { console.log(error); } } // console.log(dataCust) useEffect(() => { getAllCust(); }, []); return( <> Customer Manajemen Customer Name {dataCust && dataCust.map((cust) => ( ))}
Id Name Contact Address Action
{cust.id} {cust.name} {cust.contact} {cust.address}
{/* Modal Add Data Admin */} Add Data Customer Name Contact Address {/* Modal Edit */} Edit Data Customer Id Name Contact Address {/* Second modal Delete */} Are you sure ? Are you sure to delete this customer ? ) }; export default CustomerManajemen;
